Row.Text: Increases growth by 30% in all cities. Must be built next to a River.
Grants a free Builder. All Builders can build 2 extra improvement. Must be built on Desert (including Floodplains) without Hills.

Patronage of Great People costs 50% less [ICON_Faith] Faith. Districts in this city provide +4 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type (for example, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points from the Theater Square district). Must be built on Hills.

+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all naval units[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold on all Coast tiles for this city. Must be built on the Coast, and adjacent to land and a Harbor district with a Lighthouse.
+2 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. Grants 2 Trader unit. Must be built on the Coast, adjacent to land and a Harbor district.
+3 [ICON_Food] Food, +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold, and +3 [ICON_Production] Production on all Desert tiles for this city (non-Floodplains). Must be built on Desert or Floodplains without Hills.

All current units gain 3 promotion level. All Archaeologists from the owner may enter foreign lands without Open Borders. Must be built on flat Grassland or Plains adjacent to an Encampment district with a Barracks or Stable.

Replace.Text: 所有城市发展加速30%。必须建在河流旁边。
赠予1个免费建造者。所有建造者可建造2个额外的改良设施。必须建在没有丘陵的沙漠上（包括泛滥平原）。
伟人赞助消耗的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值减少50%。该城市区域为它们类型的 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人点数+4（比如，来自剧院广场区的 [ICON_GreatWriter] 大作家点数）。必须建在丘陵上。
所有海军单位的 [ICON_Movement] 移动力+1[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]该城市的所有海岸单元格+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。必须建在靠近已有灯塔的港口的海岸上。
+2 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。授予2个商人单位。必须建在邻近陆地和港口的海岸上。
为该城市所有沙漠单元格（非泛滥平原）+3 [ICON_Food] 食物，+3 [ICON_Gold] 金币，+3 [ICON_Production] 生产力。必须建在没有丘陵的沙漠或泛滥平原上。
目前所有单位获得3级强化升级。所拥有的考古学家可在没有开放边境的情况下进入外国。必须建在平坦的草原或平原上，且靠近带有兵营或马厩的军营区域。
